headline: The 3 Smartest Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett has generated tremendous gains for the long-term shareholders of Berkshire Hathaway over the years.  The Berkshire Hathaway portfolio today features stakes in more than three dozen companies that were either selected by Buffett himself or one of his investing deputies.  Jennifer Saibil (Amazon): It's hard to believe that just two years ago, investors were worried about Amazon's future.
